cast.name: 雷德利·斯科特 Ridley Scott

writer.name: 查尔斯·德·劳氏里卡 Charles de Lauzirika

director.name: 查尔斯·德·劳氏里卡 Charles de Lauzirika

this_title: The Beast Within: The Making of 'Alien'
trans_title: 心生野兽：异形幕后制作纪录
introduction: This made-for-DVD documentary treats horror and science fiction film fans to a behind-the-scenes look at the making of Alien, the terrifying classic about a spaceship crew trapped with a hideous monster that's hunting them one by one. Features interviews with director Ridley Scott and master designer H.R. Giger, as well as with star Sigourney Weaver and other members of the cast and crew, who share their experiences from working on the project and discuss the special efforts that went into bringing it all together.
chinese_title: 心生野兽：异形幕后制作纪录
foreign_title: The Beast Within: The Making of 'Alien'
